roleset.name: make widely-known

example.name: active
example.text: Dealers say [the firm]-1 apparently has wanted *trace*-1 to publicize its recent buying and subsequent selling of 30-year bonds by using Cantor Fitzgerald Securities Corp. as a broker.

example.name: passive with attribute
example.text: Still, scientists breathed a collective sigh of relief about the finding, because it demonstrates how to overcome the ``flux pinning'' problem that-1 [*trace*-1]-2 earlier this year was widely publicized *trace*-2 as undercutting new superconductors' potential.
